EmailTemplate.name: VNS_FusionePCR Integration with VisiCAD.Starting Now
EmailTemplate.subject: Starting Soon: Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Starting in 20 minutes Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD
This is a reminder the webinar that you have registered for "Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD" will be starting in 20 minutes.
During this webinar you will take a closer look at how VisiCAD's integration with Fusion ePCR streamlines the collection of pre-hospital data both in the field and the office.
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/ccmrrvb
DATE: Wednesday, October 26
TIME: 1 PM Eastern | Noon Central | 11 AM Mountain | 10 AM Pacific
Trouble Logging In? Call 800.799.4510 for the iLinc Support Team Help
Questions? Cheri Lane in TriTech Marketing (563) 387-4858 cheri.lane@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
